name: Admin Links Plus
author: pbhj from an original work by kdmurray

sections.description:
Note that this plugin is largely obsolete with the new admin ribbon in WP3.
This plugin provides a widget which can contain links to pages in the administration panel in one of your sidebars.
These links are only visible to those already logged in as an administrator.
Version 1.2.0 added loginout links and displays a login form for logged-out users.

Release History

1.3.0, 2013-03-03 — Updated testing info.

1.2.1, 2009-03-27 — Corrected meta info URLs and added use of get_bloginfo to get address for login form – big error!

1.2.0, 2009-03-23 — Altered to include loginout link using wp_loginout() from general-template.php; cleaned up indenting; plugin and readme fixed up for adding to WP’s SVN repo.

1.2.0 — despite a promise to add alterations for login, no activity since April 2008, hence refactoring and releasing

1.1.4 — minor changes for compatibility with WordPress 2.5.x; by kdmurray

Feedback

pbhj /|7′ alicious D07′ com

Copyright / GPL

sections.installation:
1. Extract admin-links-plus-sidebar-widget.php into your wp-content/plugins folder (or any subfolder)

  2. Activate the plugin in WordPress

  3. Add the widget to your page

  4. Set the options to select which links you want displayed

  5. (optional) test and report back to the authors
